text: Jet polymer is very unprofessional!! They need more office experienced people. When you are having issues among the job instead of them helping resolve the issue they add to the problem them doesn't care about nobody problem. They point system is backwards they don't accept excuses even if u get sick,lost a relative,had court...

name: Edward Napper
text: Fast but know matter what brokee says loads are 43 plus

name: Wayne Hansen
text: Delivered a load of scraps from Michigan. Upon arrival found a note on the office door, "Will be back soon". Another driver stated it had taken 3-1/2 hours to unload, and now he's had to wait 15 minutes already for his paperwork. He stated he'd already called the number on the paper and someone would be on the way shortly. 15 minutes later when the clerk arrived, I was informed I had to have either an empty weight and loaded weight scale ticket from the same scale, on the same day as I picked up the load, or, I would need to go and get a loaded weight scale ticket, bring it back to get unloaded, then go back and get an empty weight scale ticket, and bring it back in order to receive my completed paperwork. The nearest scale is the CAT scale at the TA exit 168 in Montgomery. Round trip 12 miles. Total time was 4-1/2 hours. Be careful if you have to turnaround at the north end, I saw 2 torn off mud flaps lying in the dirt where drivers backed over the curb. When backed into the docks, you're over an 8-foot wide concrete trough with a slowly moving stream of water, centered right under your doors. There was no way to avoid stepping into the water. You're on concrete, but be careful because the Moss underneath is extremely slippery.

name: James Williams
text:
You have to get an empty weight before arrival. Closest scale is 9 miles away.  THEN, half the day loading. THEN, you have to drive 9 miles back to the scale, for the loaded weight, AND drive 9 miles back, to get your BOL. It is a dumpy recycling place, where you may pick up a flat tire, and get your feet wet, in stagnant water, if you get out of your truck when you're docked. A minimum of 4 to 5 hours loading.
The ladies in the office are pretty, so that is the only good thing.

text: Great service! Always friendly and great prices on scrap! Local company has been faithfully serving the community for a long time! Don't go anywhere else!

name: Rachel Gabel
text: If you’ve ever been to a recycling place, no matter the type, it can sometimes give you an uneasy feeling. But let’s face it, it’s going to be dirty, very loud, and maybe even busy as all get out. But I gotta tell you... the guys at Capital Recycling are awesome. Friendly and quick at their jobs, I’ve never had a bad experience there. I got to meet the owners and well, those are high-caliber folks right there! Y’all have my business hands down!

resp.text: I appreciate the kind words!  Thanks for trusting us with your recycling needs!

name: JT Walker
text: I just wanted to leave a shout out to the folks at Capital Recycling. They were extremely knowledgeable and the above board on pricing. You guys run a great place, thanks.

resp.text: Thanks!  Be sure and introduce yourself to me next time you come in.  Thanks again, Tommy

name: Tyler Thompson
text: If you are looking for a place who will pay you TOP dollar for your metal and offer you EXCEPTIONAL customer service look no further! Recently, my father passed away, and left a building FILLED with scrap, which had accumulated over the 40 years he was at that location. Being overwhelmed with the MONUMENTAL task of removing this myself, I contacted Tommy, the owner of Capital, whom my father had done business with for years, and asked him if he would be interested in helping me remove it. Despite the difficulty of the task, Tommy accepted the CHALLENGE and sent out his best men to do the job. With hard work and determination they made a MOUNTAIN of metal DISAPPEAR and PAID me MORE for it than I would have gotten anywhere else. I wouldn’t have been able to do this on my own, was IMPRESSED with the DILIGENCE and HONESTY of everyone involved with this operation, I will be GRATEFUL  for Capital Recycling the rest of my life! Again, SAVE  yourself the TROUBLE of going anywhere else and bring your metal here; you’ll like the STACKS in your pocket and have a SMILE on your face, I GUARANTEE it!

resp.text: I really hated to hear about your father.  Sure did enjoy getting to know him over the years and thanks for trusting us.  Stop by next time you're in town!!

name: Paul Cutter
text: Great place to take your recyclables. I have been taking copper to Capital Recycling for years and will continue.

resp.text: Thanks for bringing in the good stuff!

name: Harmonie Cutter
text: Great team from handling the delivery of the material, cashing out and overall experience. Tommy and Janie are friendly and know their stuff when it comes to metals and recycling.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Derrick Hampton
text: Rip-off

resp.text: Ask for Tommy next time you come in and let me see what I can do.  I can't control what the market is doing but I don't want you feeling ripped off.

resp.text: We must have been really busy that day.  We don't expect anybody to carry 300 lbs of batteries to the scale.  If there is a next time ask for Tommy and I'll take care of you.

name: Kayla Sallada
text: I called José, sent photos of the junk and he showed up prepared the very next morning. He was prompt, courteous, professional and quick. The next time I need help I’ll be calling him!

name: Danica Coe
text: I would highly recommend Jose.  He came over within a couple of hours and gave me an estimate.  Then came back, the same day, to pick up! He was a pleasure to work with.  Thanks Jose!

name: Jacob M
text: Called and set up a time to meet, got a text saying he passed. Not very professional, avoid.

name: Huntsville Shred Service
text: Very helpful group of people. Great to work with.

name: steven jones
text: Great people

name: Carrera Hallett
text: Worst customer service ever! And they do not pick up your garbage but will definitely charge you for it. Paid for twice weekly service and trash has only been picked up TWICE FOR THE ENTIRE MONTH.

name: Kyle Nichols
text: The services provided are not within their contract terms. They are regularly late by days and fail to complete the pick up. We are still waiting for them to come an complete our regular scheduled services from Last week! We have called everyday since the failed service and have done multiple online complaints. We were told every day that they would be out by the end of the day to complete service.  It has been 5 days and they have not shown up yet! I am beginning to wonder if there is a Lawyer out there who would take on a class action; as this is an on going problem in our area. Every customer who has had to deal with this on a regular basis should be given a prorated credit for their breach of contract.

name: Sharmene Smith
text:
Positive: The drivers are absolutely great! No complaints about them.

Negative: This company took over for Advanced Disposal in my neighborhood. First, everyone on my street received a trash can except for my family. We have to get up to put our garbage bags on the curb before the trash is picked up. We have to keep everything in our garage because animals tear into the trash if we keep it outside.

I've emailed through all channels with no solutions. Calling is even worse. It's been almost 3 months with no solution. We are getting charged for a 95 gallon cart that we have yet to receive.

At this point, we have no idea what to do.

name: Glenn Blakely
text: I have been displeased with this company ever since Saraland has gone with them. They do not pick up large piles of limbs and yard debris like our last company. They are late and have a habit of leaving the empty can in the middle of your driveway. It might be ok if you live in a neighborhood, but living along a main street, it is not wise to stop your car in the street.

name: Lori Rueschenberg
text: Previous waste removal company collected bins three weeks ago. Amwaste is my neighborhood’s new removal company.  I have called six times asking for a bin as the majority of my neighbors have all received their bins. One house even received 3 bins! I called on trash collection day to tell them to see if I could have one of those but was told the trash collectors do NOT deliver bins. Each time I have called I have been told they would get a bin to me. I was told that I was a customer in good standing as my bills were up to date. I am in the process of moving and have explained that I have less than a month to move. I still don’t have a bin for my trash. What kind of waste company does not provide paying customers with trash bins!!!  I have written only a few a Google reviews but this company takes the cake for being the worst ever!

name: Benjamin Taylor
text: I will file a formal complaint to whoever is the government authority. I have lived in my new rental house 2 months and they will not respond to phone or email. It is impossible to contact them. I need to be able to get trash service and pay for it.

name: David Black
text: It is hard to rate a service that is paid for, but not provided. We wait on the phone forever just to be told, “we’ll get someone right out there” yet they never show up. They don’t respond to emails. Extremely poor customer service to match their equally poor performance. Very disappointed our trash collection changed to this company. Please do better!!

name: Jennifer Gardner
text: No communication at all and horrible service!! We requested two trash cans when we built our house and were told that they did have enough cans to give us two. So whatever, but then a few weeks later our neighbors finished their house and moved in and were given two cans 🤔   Then we set up auto pay when we called to set up service and get our can, and they pick up our cans until all of the sudden they didn’t. Call and they tell us they haven’t received a payment since a date that was before we even moved in and even got our can or set up payment. We have not received anything in the mail to tell us there was an issue until we call to question things. When we start asking how a payment was made before we even moved in, what happened to the payment that was set up when we set up service, and how we have gone this long with them picking up our trash if a payment hasn’t been made they have no idea and no answers for us. We have never had a problem with any other waste company until now. Zero communication from them and then when you have an issue because of their lack of communication they don’t care and it is just your problem to figure out!

name: Karen Williams
text: This company provided very spotty service. I had 2 day garbage and then 1 day recycle. My trash pick up was not consistent and neither was the recycle. I've called and complained several times. The last time I called they tried to tell me I only had 1 day trash pickup which was a lie. I didn't always use the Tues service but was paying for it... she said that all I had was the Fri service so they took a day away because THEIR DRIVERS ARE INCOMPETENT. I will be pursuing another company

name: janice jordan
text: Terrible company, sometimes will pick up trash other times will pass it even though I keep my bill paid up. This company collect what they are TRASH!!!!

name: paul trunec
text: It took three weeks and three phone calls for the first pick up. Now, waiting two weeks for the current one. I  would have gladly paid the increase for Advanced  Disposal.

name: JerseyGirl InAlabama
text: Every single week I have to call them to come pick up my recycling and household garbage. They are unreliable considering how much they charge every three months for weekly pick-up

name: Trill Team
text: Apparently this company took over Advanced Disposal’s bid in my area. We have a week of trash that has not been collected. We never received any updates from Advanced Disposal that Amwaste was taking over and we for sure have not heard from Amwaste! We only found out about Amwaste because our new neighbors next door informed us that supposedly they will now service our area. We have not received our new Amwaste trash cans and Advanced Disposal have not picked up there old cans. I am turned off already and I am extremely frustrated! I will be contacting the city and commissioners office first thing Monday morning!

text: Company does not respond to email contact on their website.  When I call the phone number on their LaGrange website, no one picks-up.  The driver does a good job on pick-up.

The drivers have been great but the administrative group leaves a lot to be desired.

text: Did not pick up garbage and trash. When I try to get ahold of them and fill out a message through internet like they asked. It then says oops something went wrong. I have tried four different times to submit a request for help, and each time it says oops something went wrong. I cannot get ahold of anybody to rectify the situation.

text: They raised my bill from $60 a quarter to $93 without any warning verbal or written and was told " That's the new rate " I don't expect a discount but I do expect something in the mail the rate is going up by 50%.. there would be times they'd not pickup my garbage or recyclables ...

text: I've seen a lot of negative reviews.  I signed a contract 9 months ago.  They missed my pick-up the first week, but from then on were great. There are ups and downs with any business, but I feel like they treated me more than fair, and I would recommend them if you need garbage service.

We was with another company that kept going up on us. One day a young nice sales. Salesman came to our door and we let him in to hear his pitch. He was very polite and caring. Their price was actually better than what we was paying so we decided to make the change.
One day we  put the wrong can out and filled it with stuff that she was throwing away. Well later the next day, I noticed that day the team didn't pick it up since it wasn't a Amwaste can. So I called and talked to Lisa. They explained that since we pay for 1 can pick up twice weekly that the guys did not pick it up because it wasnt their can. I went to my bedroom for like 10 minutes and the can was empty when I came back in the front and looked out the window. Now that is service there my friends.

They care nothing about the customer and will not pick the trash up at all but they will bill you for no service, they used excuse after excuse for not picking up our garbage and then an out right lie saying the truck could not go over a culvert which we do not have. Do not do business with these people you will definitely regret it if you do.

name: Michael “Miggles” Migas
text: I pay for both debris and recycling pickup once per week. They come about every other week. The regular trash doesn't always get picked up either.

name: Autumn Demeranville
text: We have been with them since September. We experienced some of the things people are complaining about, but I understood they were getting used to a new route and customers. We received a friendly letter apologizing for the late recycling pick up. Explanation was the response was larger than they expected and had to make adjustments. Haven't had problems in weeks. They do handle Holiday pick up differently than the last company I used. I don't really know when they are going to pick up on a Holiday week, but other than that no real complaints.

name: A. A. Gapud
text: Doing a search for a phone number for this company, I happened to notice all these bad reviews, and felt compelled to say something positive. Perhaps I'm living in an alternate universe from everyone else, or maybe there's been some changes, but we've had nothing but positive experiences with this company. Our account is a residential weekly pickup of recyclables and garbage, and we switched to them last Fall 2019 because we were really taken by their salesman -- probably not the salesperson described in some of these reviews. Since then, we've had reliable pickup every single week, including holidays. Every time I had a billing question over the phone, I received great service (special shoutout to "Tori") and pleasant conversation. This current week was the only time they missed a pickup, and a call to Tori clarified that, not surprisingly, they are not picking up recyclables because of the current pandemic. Really sorry about the bad experience the others have received: We've had bad service from previous waste collection companies before, so I totally understand. But we've been happy with our service so far, and even highly recommend them.

name: John Cleverdon
text: Service was supposed to start on Tuesday, Sept. 6th.  Pick ups on Tuesdays and Fridays, recycling on Wednesdays.  Because of Labor day, I was told (by a neighbor) they were running a day behind, didn't find out until after they didn't pick up my trash that week.  Then the next week only picked up on Wednesday because I called after they didn't pick up on Tuesday.  Then they didn't pick up on Friday.  I called and left a message that it wasn't picked up.  When I called today (Monday) to make sure it was going to be picked up as scheduled, was told my contract was closed, and that I had called and left a message that I wanted to cancel my contract.  I didn't do that.  Was told they would re-open my account, and my trash would be picked up as scheduled.  I guess I'll see.  Maybe I should have left it cancelled and gone back to my old company.  They didn't do recycling, but at least they did what they said they would do - pick up my trash twice a week.

name: BRAD WALKER
text: Poor customer service good luck on getting your debris  or trash picked if I could give leass the 1 star I would

text: They are supposed to pick up on Tuesday... today is Thursday and they still haven’t picked up the trash. This happens at least once a month.

I’ve called over and over and told I would hear back from a manager and never did. I’ve been hung up on just becuase they don’t want to hear me out... don’t waste your time or money

I have a question for Amwaste: What person in their right mind would sign up for service with your company, when the people you employ is disrespectful? I will never do business with this company. I wish I could give a zero star.

It took weeks to get a hold of someone in order to cancel, and they wouldn't refund me for the months I had paid for that I wouldn't be using. Do not use this company!!

name: Noir Gold
text: BEWARE OF THIS COMPANY-HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! Waited on hold for over an hour, second time- over 45 minutes..... When I finally got through to there customer service department- The lady had a horrible attitude and hung up in my face twice. I have never received this type of disrespect to this level. But I see others have ran into the same issue so I’m not surprised.

name: Lennon Steadham
text: Amwaste has been a nightmare. We bought in to the promises of recycling pickup when they sent their scavenger around to solicit our neighborhood. We  immediately regretted our decision after reading their reviews and called to cancel the service before it even began. They have absolutely zero customer service over the phone. I called no less than 20 times over the course of a day to FINALLY get a very aggravated woman on the phone who said our service would not be started. A week later and we have their can sitting in our front yard with, once again, no communication for them to come pick it up. We’re so glad that our current trash provider was understanding and made sure to not change our current service. Don’t. Waste. Your. Time. They get one star because google forces you to give at least one.

name: Herbert Miller
text: They make a living by stealing your money and not providing the services  they promised. This is the second week my trash wasn’t picked up.

name: brett
text: This sketchy company has begun price gouging small, reliable garbage companies that have been operating in southern AL for 50 years. They go door to door (even when told not to or when people have no soliciting signs in their yard) and tell people they'll pick up twice a week, which if you look at their website for 2 seconds, they only pick up once a week everywhere else. Seems like an obvious ploy just to get people to switch. Don't buy into the shady sales tactics. I've heard of them pre-filling out their cancellation cards before, and even saying that they'll send out the cancellation cards for you causing people to literally be afraid this company is going to try to cancel their other garbage pickup service. I know on the surface an *initially* cheaper and *initially* more frequent garbage service that's coming into town may seem attractive, but remember to stop and think about what they stand to gain from you, and to research if they actually hold up what they promise in other areas. There's a reason that certain companies in this area have been around for literally 5 decades, and it was done by building a clientele through RELIABLE, FAIR PRICING slowly instead of lying to people about services / going door to door price gouging other companies until they raise the prices after those companies go out of business.

name: Scott Angus
text:
Opps...we made a big mistake changing to Am Waste. Our contract began August 2nd for pick up on Friday and Tuesday. They came Friday August 2nd, then it was Wednesday August 7th not Tuesday the 6th. Last time they picked up was late Saturday August 10th, not Friday as contracted and nothing this week. I called Thursday August 15th and was told that the gal on the phone would get a hold of the Supervisor and have someone come out. Now it is Saturday, I have an over-flowing can by the street and no sign of an Am Waste truck at all.

I want our money back so we can go back to a reliable service and I must warn you...DON'T DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY!!! THEY DO NOT HONOR THEIR CONTRACTS!!!

name: Matthew Booth
text: This company is an absolute joke. Called one day after signing on with their service to cancel because I read the reviews after I signed up on July 10th. Called the 11th to cancel. Called the 15th to confirm to find out that they had not cancelled. I wasn't getting off the phone until it was cancelled. Called back on the 30th to find out where my refund was and was told that they processed refunds at the beginning of the month. Just called today August 12th, one month after cancelling, still no refund. I was told that they didn't have a refund request on file. What kind of company has a separate refund request AFTER you cancel the service. This company needs to be put to the curb. Please don't sign up for this service! It will only bring you a massive headache.

name: Lisa Walker
text:
I’m only giving 1 star bc you have to in order to review. Yes the young man came to our door to solicit business. Due to the lower cost of the service we agreed to switch. This was on Thursday June 6. However my husband and I both had a change of heart and decided to stick to the service we’ve had for over a year with NO PROBLEMS. We have 3 business days to cancel per the contract. I canceled on Monday June 10. I was told they wouldn’t cash the check they were given and they’d send it back. Surprise!! They cashed it and after almost a month of the runaround from calling I was just told “they’ll issue the checks by the end of the month”. So here it is July 8th and I’m so grateful we actually didn’t switch bc their customer service is awful. I don’t have any problems with American Waste Solutions. Don’t be fooled by the “we’re cheaper” pitch. We decided the grass wasn’t greener on the other side and decided to stay with our current provider!  I want my $57 back and I will keep in them until I receive it. Again don’t be fooled just bc you wanna save $$.

****Follow up***. Here it is August 16 and I’ve yet to receive a call back from JUNE!!! I guess I’m let the BBB in on this transaction. It’s not even about the $57 even tho it’s NOT THEIRS!!!  I got a lady  today and she said they received the request in 8/5. Don’t make me get out my phone records and show you where I been calling since June. STAY CLEAR OF THIS DREADFUL  BUSINESS!!! You’ve been warned.

FINAL UPDATE:  Today 8/19/19 we FINALLY received our refund today!! It’s dated 10 days ago and no one has ever called back. I called again this morning for the office manager and I think it’s a safe bet  that she ( Mary Ann) ISNT gonna call me back but this nightmare is now OVER!! Good luck to anyone else in the same boat we were in.

text: I don't know what you would consider a lot to choose from but when I asked if they had any Jeep Cherokees I was told they had a lot. And even though I stated that I needed a Cherokee not a Grand Cherokee they still told me they had a lot. Now they don't have any signs up as to what you can pick and not pick. You get told that anything outside of the fence is not to be picked but then they also mean anything underneath the barn is also not to pick. As somebody so rudely came up as I was pulling apart and asked me to put everything back the way I found it because the vehicle that had been there for 4 years was for sale. Just be very specific on what you ask for and apparently remind them that parts can be crossed over from one vehicle to the next. It doesn't have to be exact same model and year. The guy that stopped me was snooty about that as well. I definitely won't be continuing any business here or referring them. But they make plenty of money giving pennies to the dollar on scrap metal so this review won't really matter.

name: J C
text: Sell your scrap metal here.

name: Mark Toland
text: New owner/management is awesome. No more shutdown for lunch and they answered the phone when I called and answered my questions. The gentleman named Jerry was very nice and very helpful. He gave me the information I needed to properly prep my next round of recyclables. Major improvement from the past. Really appreciate the entire crew there. Just nice folks. See for yourself. Thank you.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Mark! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we are happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon. Cheers!

name: Rodger Epps
text: Went at 3:35 and the rude woman at the window was super hateful, and said they were cleaning up for the day, and wasn't accepting any more. It was nearly 30 minutes before posted closing time. I drove 30 minutes to get here, I will drive the same distance to another company in the future. This is not how you treat people at a business.

resp.text:
Rodger,
It is our sincere apologies that you received this type of service, we pride ourselves on our professional service and I am very sorry we lost your business. We would like the opportunity to learn more of the details on what happened and how we can gain back your business. If you are interested can you reach out to the local yard manager at your convenience, Derrick Hoffman 256-224-6066.

name: Bradley Drach
text:
They refused to buy copper with the jacket burned off!
Lady at window was rude and not personable!
Will not be using this business again!
Went to Park City Salvage and they payed number one copper price with no questions asked
and super nice people to deal with!

resp.text:
Bradley,
I am sorry to hear your experience with us, we obey all laws, rules and regulations set forth by the local government and unfortunately we can not purchase copper that has been burnt.  Please reach out directly to speak with our GM Jason Avery at 931-292-9458 regarding your experience.

name: Ryan Cass
text: Since Aluminum Can Buyers in Huntsville closed, Harmon Scrap Metal has been my go to place for recycling aluminum cans. The staff are friendly and their prices are better than what was at ACB so I’m happy to make the longer drive up to Hazel Green.

resp.text: Thank You for your business Ryan!

name: Janet L Hunter
text: They are the cleanest scrapyard.  Best paying around.

name: John Brockway
text: This place used to be a really nice place. I came here every time I had scrap and I wanted a little extra cash. However, It started going downhill about 6 months ago and I started going to different yards around the area. I was talking to one of my friends and they said they had started to bring it back up and make it better again so I wanted to try it out again. And surely enough when I went there they had a different guy that helped me and he was a lot better. Last time the guy was very disrespectful and just was not someone I wanted to be around. This new guy though was a lot better. I am very glad that they are finally turning it around and I hope it stays this way with some new staffing.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback!

name: Sue Tate
text: Horrible prices paid versus competitors and very rude ...I would donate my scrap before taking it to them again

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear you were not pleased with our prices, but more importantly we are concerned about our team members being rude. If you would please reach out to Jason Avery our GM and explain what happened it would greatly appreciated. His number is 931-293-4271.

name: Jeffrey Hudson
text: I bring my aluminum cans here. They have a good system for deposit and they pay an industry fair amount for scrap. The employees are also friendly.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, we appreciate the feedback!

name: Nicole Pettus stringfield (Nicole)
text: Pays with cash so that's good that I didn't have to go to somewhere to cash check and real polite

name: Jim Steele
text: Honest scales! What I get paid for what I bring is what matters to me. I live in Lincoln County, Tenn. Last week, I took a full 16-foot trailer load of scrap cast iron and steel to a competitor in Tennessee, and was told the whole load had 900 pounds on it. I got $45 at $5 a hundred. Today, I took HALF a load of the exact same material to Harmon. It weighed 1,560 pounds and I got $78 at $5 a hundred.

resp.text: So glad you became a customer, thank you!

name: John Williams
text: They have poor  customer  service.... NOW you have to  present  your tag receipt with your ID in order  to  get a check. No matter  the amount. Pretty much the few times that I have been  there it has always been  something.  And not to mention  the lady at the window  is very rude and a moron. Although the yard Is  nice and clean, they need  to disclose  new rules over the  phone when you call

resp.text: John, this is a state rule that unfortunately we have no control over. Feel free to give the manager a call and we can discuss the regulations before your need visit.

name: William Bomar
text: We have been using Harmon for numerous years. We bring our tin as it is called (we still call it shredder scarp) and if we have some large/heavy objects they will help unload. We bring all of our brass, #1 and #2 copper, #1, #2, and #3 wire, aluminum, and stainless steel. The whole process is smooth and always has been. We see no need to go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thanks for being a loyal customer!

name: Amie Rivera
text: Very fast and friendly.

name: Tony Johnson
text: I took some #1 copper there and they said it was only 16 lbs but I know it was at least 40 or 50. So I wont be going back.

resp.text: Tony, At HSM we make sure that all scales are tested by the State and also the scale manufacturer periodically as required by law and company policy. It is unfortunate you feel as though the scales were off. I can assure you that our company nor employees would short weight as there are weights that get automatically captured to the image of each item. Please reach out to the manager to discuss further.

name: Alexus Beard
text: The lady that worked at the window was completely rude and made not want to come back.  She was very inconsiderate and rushing me the whole time.  The prices are fair but the service at the desk was TRASH.

resp.text: So sorry you had an unpleasant experience, we strive to have great customer relations. Feel free to reach out to the manager and we can resolve your issues. We would like to keep your business.

name: Alexander
text: Very clean for a scrap yard, competive pricing, never had a flat there like most scrap yard. Staff was very helpful. Would recommend to others. Easy to follow instructions posted and signs for hours of operation

name: Jus Lamb
text: One person at a time. Youll be there a 1hr or more most times. Then lady at desk is so rude. They dont have no pride for a customer

name: Nick Wallace
text: There is no better place than harmons best price great customer service the new lady melissa  is awesome

resp.text: Thank You for the fabulous review, we greatly appreciate your business!

name: Jim Steele
text: I have used this place a few time sunder a few owners over the years. At my latest visit, things really were a lot cleaner there than before. Good clean easy place to unload. I was pleasant to the staff, they were pleasant right back. Helped unload my small volume non-shreddables (cans, etc.) Equipment operator did a great job unloading my trailer, even though he has a grapple instead of a magnetic pickup. Got my check. I don't know what else I could have wanted, except for higher scrap prices, and those are not the fault of this company.

name: Stephanie Sanders-Work
text: Freaking ridiculous. Only 1 vehicle allowed back at a time and no one out there helping unload. The workers are very rude and want to rush you but don't/wont help you. I absolutely hate this scrap yard. Worst one ever.

resp.text: We are very sorry that you feel this way. It is a safety concern to have multiple customers/vehicles around the heavy equipment. This is for the safety of yourself and everyone else.

name: Clay Potter
text: Always real nice and does a good job

resp.text: Thank You, we appreciate your business.

name: Jim Dunning
text: The previous owner, I believe screwed me out of what I believe was hundreds of dollars. But the new owners seem to be alright. I always thought that when gas prices go up so does the scrap prices. That hasn't happened yet. There going down, doesn't make sense.

resp.text: Sorry you had a bad experience, we appreciate the feedback regarding our employees and will take the necessary steps to insure a better experience next time.

So sorry you had an unpleasant experience, we strive to have great customer relations. Please reach out to the manager so we can resolve your issues and keep you as a customer. 256-693-1020

text: Poor hours, poor pay, poor customer service, poor treatment of employees, ridiculous expectations, and pray to God you don’t have anything to do. Because it’s 6-6 every weekday. Losing my job there was honestly one of the best things to ever happen to me. I make double now.

text: Employees were very helpful. Once I pulled in, I was given clear instructions on where to go to for my different metals. Prices were as good as you could hope for with the world as it is. Will absolutely be back.

Hello Daniel,
We appreciate your feedback on your experience and we're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit! We hope to see you soon!

name: Charlie Webster
text: I have been twice today here at SA Recycling because out of maby four or five different metal recycling scrap yards SA pays the most for there ferrous metals or scrap metal like steel, iron and tin. Although I have brought non-ferrous metal many time here I'm not sure how they compare to the other metal recycling companies in the area but I haven't complained any so they pay enough for metals like copper, brass and aluminum or non-ferrous metals. I have never had any problems there and all there employees are professional and nice. My go to scrap yard!

resp.text: Thank you very much Charlie for being a loyal customer, we appreciate your review and hope to see you soon!

name: jeremy henderson
text:
After sharing the sharing the following,HQ stopped communications.

"Thursday a friend of the family took a load of scrap metal (iron/common steel) the facility here in Decatur,Al (hwy 20). While he was in the back having the trailer unloaded one of the laborers got smart with him because he didn't get out and help them unload it,I guess they didn't see the handicap tag or decal in his truck. They also damaged the wall on my trailer while unloading the scrap,the right wall was hanging loosely off as he pulled back to the front office. Then I took some non-ferrous metals (a couple of refrigerator compressors,a couple bags of cans,and some stainless steel sheeting) there Friday. They punched the stainless steel in as tin,and when my girlfriend mentioned it to the lady in the office she flared her nose and said "They know what they are doing." We did nothing to bring this kind of attention to ourselves,nor did we react with such primitive retaliation. I know my my metals because i grew up helping my gram pa clean and sort metals,and knowing the value of a dollar I too save metals when it comes my way. I don't know why we received such treatment,but it wasn't necessary. I know that the individuals involved don't represent the main body of your company,but if they are treating others the same way we were treated then they are potentially costing the company money and loyal customers. Thank you for your time,and look forward to hearing back soon."

name: Ben Blankenship
text: Been coming here for 10 years or more, from day 1 til now always have had a great experience. Friendly employees/staff. They also have a pretty good “system” set up, from the scales you drive on to weigh out steel,white goods, and other bigger metals, to the digital scales for the more “precious” metals, batteries, and cans ect. My only complaint is there have been several times when I bring in wire, and they group it all together as “computer” wire, when there is 18 gauge and bigger gauges wire that should be a diff price and I have to point it out to them.. everytime and I have lost money bc of it.-!: that is usually 90% of what I bring (wire) I know it’s not their fault but ever since the law passed for no burnt wire it has been chaotic and not accurate assessment of the wire. And 1 last thing, they do have some of the better prices(by cents pennies) but I can go to dothan to panhandle and get waaay better prices(that’s where jack takes their metals and sell to panhandle is what I’ve been told) but unless I have a very big load where  the price difference matters I go to jack bc I’ll use 15$ in gas to get to panhandle vs. less than 8$ to go to jack. Other than that it’s a great scrap yard highly recommended

text:
It is impossible to recommend Trey Bennett and 1-800-Got-Junk in Mobile enough. I have had to close down a large facility with only a few months notice and generated a massive amount of junk that needed to be discarded. Trey met with me, helped generate a game plan, and has stood behind his word at every moment.

His team is top-notch, works extremely hard, and is always courteous to me and the other employees. They are considerate of the facility and the other equipment, show up on time as scheduled, and always perform at the best of their ability. If you have junk that needs to be removed, Trey provides a service that takes care of all of your needs at a price that is highly competitive. Just a fantastic company all the way around.
